channel.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Scale_Policy on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy
item.description: SoftLayer_Scale_Policy Service Datatype Description Local cooldown The number of seconds this policy will wait after lastActionDate on group before performing another action. If not present, the group's cooldown value is used. Type: integer createDate When this policy was created. Type: dateTime deleteFlag When set and true any edit that happens on this object, be it calling edit on this directly or setting as a child while editing a parent object, will end up being a deletion.
